mapper.select: SELECT a.APPROVAL_ID , DOCUMENT_TYPE, APPROVAL_TITLE, REQUESTER_ID, e.EMP_NAME AS REQUESTER_NAME, t.TEAM_NAME, TO_CHAR(REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(a.MODIFIED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFIED_DATE, e2.EMP_NAME AS RECIPIENT_NAME ,STEP, STATUS, APPROVAL_DATE FROM APPROVAL a JOIN APPROVAL_LINE al ON a.APPROVAL_ID = al.APPROVAL_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.REQUESTER_ID = e.EMP_ID JOIN TEAM t ON t.TEAM_CODE = e.TEAM_CODE JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON e2.EMP_ID = al.RECIPIENT_ID WHERE REQUESTER_ID = #{requester_id} AND TEMP_SAVE_FLAG = 'N' AND a.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY a.APPROVAL_ID DESC, al.STEP ASC
